suite.name: Tasks

test.name: Open the website, locate to the correct area and save a screenshot

kw.name: Open browser and locate to given URL
Open Available Browser
kw.doc: Attempts to open a browser on the user's device from a set of supported browsers. Automatically downloads a corresponding webdriver if none is already installed.
kw.msg: Creating an instance of the Chrome WebDriver.
Creating an instance of the Chrome WebDriver.

Created Chrome browser with arguments: --disable-dev-shm-usage --disable-web-security --allow-running-insecure-content --no-sandbox --enable-local-sync-backend --local-sync-backend-dir=C:\Users\Markus\AppData\Local\Google\Chrome\User Data --user-data-dir=C:\Users\Markus\AppData\Local\Google\Chrome\User Data

Attempted combinations:

BrowserDownloadError
ChromeFalseMessage: 'chromedriver' executable needs to be in PATH. Please see https://sites.google.com/a/chromium.org/chromedriver/home
ChromeTrue

kw.name: Select the category for home internet connections
Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.arg: css:#klk-page > div > div > div > div.klk-hero-addressform-wrapper.tabbed > div.klk-page__address-selector > div > form
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'Ratavartijankatu' into text field 'css:input[placeholder="Syötä osoite"]'.

kw.name: Press Keys
kw.doc: Simulates the user pressing key(s) to an element or on the active browser.
kw.msg: Sending key(s) ('SPACE',) to css:input[placeholder="Syötä osoite"] element.
Pressing special key SPACE to element.

kw.name: Press Keys
kw.doc: Simulates the user pressing key(s) to an element or on the active browser.
kw.msg: Sending key(s) ('1',) to css:input[placeholder="Syötä osoite"] element.

kw.name: Press Keys
kw.doc: Simulates the user pressing key(s) to an element or on the active browser.
kw.msg: Sending key(s) ('ENTER',) to css:#klk-page-new---step-1-0-address > input element.
Pressing special key ENTER to element.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

suite.doc: The robot locates to Elisa.fi -website, searches for available options for home Internet connection in the given address and saves a screenshot.
